reviewText: not nearly as funny as it sounded
This is an reenactment very disappointed were are the real ones this was very misleading and I am sending it back ASAP.
Had forgotten how funny this syndicated tv show was. It is a scream, & the re-enactments are as funny as things caught on tape---maybe more-so! Good, clean fun. Highly recommended.
Here a movie that's suppose to be a laugh a minute fun video, as in all cases not everything is funny
I bought this because of the past rave reviews at how funny it was.  Seriously people?  The video is just plain dumb.
This is one of the funniest videos I have seen. I was a big fan of the TV show and I enjoy owning the dvd. I just wish it would have included the guy stuck in the chimney.
i loved this show when it originally came out it is great, if you're feeling down and a little stupid this bring you up and make you laugh and you will see some really stupid people

You don't need to be a genius to be a criminal (although it sure would help) and the proof is right here in this DVD set. It features dumb crime stories as given in actual accounts by police as well as criminals caught in the act on video. Everything from burglars who fall asleep on the job to robbers who used disguises like masks they couldn't see out of or a beer box over their head. Some were so ridiculous that the arresting officers couldn't stop laughing. All criminals depicted here are candidates for the witless protection program. This DVD set is recommended for reality TV fans.
